about_the_game:
Embark on a cosmic journey where strategic thinking meets colorful puzzle-solving in Tetrominer! Inspired by the iconic Rubik’s cube, Tetrominer challenges players to match and destroy Tetris blocks using a variety of Tetriminos—distinct shapes that dictate your moves. Dive into a vibrant world where cubes of similar colors must be deftly swiped to merge and score points, akin to the mechanics of "Collect'em All" but with a thrilling 3D twist.



Set against a backdrop of pulsating cosmic funk, Tetrominer invites players to unravel increasingly complex puzzles within a limited number of strategic moves. Each swipe sets off a chain reaction, and the more colors you merge at once, the greater your rewards!

Cosmic Puzzle Solving

Immerse yourself in a universe of dazzling colors and cosmic vibes, where every move counts towards unraveling intricate puzzles.

Innovative Gameplay

Harness the power of Tetriminos to strategically match and destroy Tetris blocks in dynamic 3D formations.

Strategic Challenges

With a limited number of moves, players must think ahead and plan their swipes carefully to maximize points and unlock new levels.

Vibrant Visuals


Enjoy stunning visuals that combine retro-futuristic aesthetics with a modern twist, creating a unique gaming experience.

Progressive Difficulty


Start with simple puzzles and progress to more complex challenges that test your puzzle-solving skills and strategic thinking.


Whether you're a puzzle enthusiast or a casual gamer looking for a fresh challenge, Tetrominer offers a captivating blend of strategy, aesthetics, and addictive gameplay. Get ready to swipe, merge, and conquer your way through the cosmic funk of Tetrominer!
